name: Ephrem the Syrian
troparia: (Tone 8) Your abundant tears made the wilderness bloom,* and your sufferings made your labours fruitful a hundredfold;* you became a shining torch over the world.* O venerable father Ephrem,* pray to Christ our God that He may save our souls.
kontakia: (Tone 8) Ever conscious of the hour of judgment,* you shed tears of bitter lament, O Ephrem.* You actively embraced the life of silence which you loved so dearly.* By your actions you have taught us.* You have spurred the lazy to repentance.
